Title: High-density speckle contrast optical tomography of brain activity
Abstract: © OSA 2018.A new method for the tomographic monitoring of cerebral blood flow changes is presented. The method is based on speckle contrast optical tomography (SCOT) to recover 3D brain activation changes due to forepaw stimulation.
